description:
Mysterious events are occurring around the eldest son of Mugi`s five boys. When he gets home and goes to do his homework, his textbooks have been torn up.  His belongings such as his shoes and writing implements are going missing.  Who is behind this?; Fumi is completely delusional after seeing a bride when passing by a wedding hall. She follows the bride all the way to the reception hall, but on the way, the wedding dress showroom grabs her attention; A pile of tests with awful grades are found deep in Bunji`s desk drawer. Mom gets mad that he can`t even hide them properly and decrees that he can`t play with this friends until he finishes all his drills...; Mom is on a stroll with Bunji and Fumi one afternoon when she happens across the ramen shop she and Dad went to back when they were getting to know each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mugi Family Mystery / Dress / Do the Drills, Do It / Noodle Time
麦家のなぞ / ドレス / ドリルやれドリル / ラーメンの歳月
